channel.title: Contract and Wallet problem
channel.description:
My system has the following specifications
Operating System and version: Windows 10 If desktop wallet (Qt or Client) block # of your client and # of connections: Windows Desktop Wallet, Halo 2.5
The problem I am having is:
I created a contract for selling BAY. It doesn´t show up in the Contracts tab, it doesn´t show up in Market tab (nowhere). However in "History" it show that the BAY for my contract are "reserved".
I want to cancel the contract. How is that possible, when nothing shows up???

item.title: Contract and Wallet problem
item.dc:creator: @cryptowarrior Crypto Warrior
item.description:
@cryptowarrior wrote:

My system has the following specifications

Operating System and version: Windows 10
If desktop wallet (Qt or Client) block # of your client and # of connections: Windows Desktop Wallet, Halo 2.5

The problem I am having is:

I created a contract for selling BAY. It doesn´t show up in the Contracts tab, it doesn´t show up in Market tab (nowhere).
However in “History” it show that the BAY for my contract are “reserved”.

I want to cancel the contract. How is that possible, when nothing shows up???

Read full topic
